      • switchMode

        protected void switchMode(int newMode,
                          long switchDelay)
        Switch to the selected mode (if not already in that mode) and delay for the specified period to allow the sensors to settle in the new mode.
        A mode of -1 resets the sensors. TODO: There really should be a better way to work out when the switch is complete, if you don't wait though you end up reading data from the previous mode.
        Parameters:
        newMode - The mode to switch to.
        switchDelay - Time in mS to delay after the switch.

      • switchMode

        protected void switchMode(java.lang.String newMode,
                          long switchDelay)
